data.actual_result: The "Done" button is practically invisible but still works
data.expected_result: The "Done" button should be shown in the top right hand corner like dark theme
data.short_description: "Done" button in new Channel Management doesn't adjust to light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Have light theme - Go to a server when you can sort channels - Click on the overflow icon then "Server Settings" - Click Channels - Click the 3 bars at the top right corner - Sort by anything
